title: Love Live Quiz
descrip: Quiz about Love Live! and its idols

qnsList.qns: How old is the Love Live! franchise?
Which character is afraid of dogs?
What was the reason for the formation of Muse?
choices: To save their school from closing down
They wanted to challenge another group
qnsList.ans: To save their school from closing down

qnsList.qns: How many lives has Aqours done?

choices: School Idol Festival: Zero to One
